description:
The fields was infested with zombies, you have the 'medicine' to erase them from the fields, but will you be able to clear them before the time runs out? with limited resources, and limited time, it's now depends on your cunning and quick decision to clear 'em out.


A very simple casual game which is very simple to play yet will give you good times!


Get the zombies by putting the mines, it will ignite a chain reaction. The zombie got hit the mine will become dangerous to other zombies, If other zombies hit them, they will perish!


All for free! :)
versionNote: **Update: Bugs Fixes, Faster Processing, Now runs smoothly on pixi devices (our sincere apology to pixi users which downloaded the game but could not run it on their device). Thank you for great reviews :)
